title: Assessment of Technical Efficiency in the Moroccan Public Hospital Network: Using the DEA Method
abstract: arXiv:2402.14940v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Background: The public hospital network in Morocco plays a crucial role in providing healthcare services. However, this network faces challenges in terms of technical efficiency in healthcare management. Objectives: This study aimed to assess the technical efficiency of the public hospital network in Morocco. Methods: This article compares the efficiency of 77 public hospital networks from 2017 to 2020. Data were collected from the Directorate of Planning and Financial Resources (DPFR) of the Health Ministry Marocco. The Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) method was employed, using three inputs (Hospital, Physician and Paramedical) and four outputs (Functional capacity, Hospitalization days and Admission). Additionally, the Malmquist index (MI) is utilized to analyse the factors of production, and peer modelling is incorporated to address hospital inefficiency. translated_title: 在摩洛哥公立医院网络中的技术效率评估：使用 DEA 方法
translated_abstract: arXiv:2402.14940v1 发表类型：新的 摘要：背景：摩洛哥公立医院网络在提供医疗服务方面发挥着关键作用。然而，该网络在医疗管理的技术效率方面面临挑战。目标：本研究旨在评估摩洛哥公立医院网络的技术效率。方法：本文比较了2017年至2020年间77家公立医院网络的效率。数据来源于摩洛哥卫生部规划和财务资源总局（DPFR）。采用数据包络分析（DEA）方法，使用三个输入（医院、医生和Paramedical）和四个输出（功能能力、住院天数和入院）。此外，还利用 Malmquist 指数（MI）来分析生产要素，采用同行建模来解决医院低效率问题。结果：公立医院网络的平均技术效率不断提高。
tldr: 该研究使用 DEA 方法评估了摩洛哥公立医院网络的技术效率，结果表明公立医院网络的平均技术效率有所改善。
